text:
とにかく、この場所は
雇い主達には秘密で、
リケットは安全だ
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10%;top: 1.5%;width: 146px;height: 103px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
奴らの所で
働いてるのに
奴ら住所
知らねぇの?
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 41%;top: 1.8%;width: 92px;height: 86px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
あぁうん、彼らは都心に
高級住宅を用意したけど
この場所は彼らが
くれる僅かなお金で
僕が用意したんだ
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 56%;top: 2.5%;width: 133px;height: 89px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
何ですってぇぇ!?普通の家があるのに
こんなボロに
住んでるの!?何でよ?
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 81%;top: 4%;width: 108px;height: 95px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11%;top: 31.5%;width: 76px;height: 47px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
君と一緒に
居たかった
から
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11%;top: 54%;width: 104px;height: 76px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 66.5%;top: 29.5%;width: 69px;height: 83px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: bold;

text:
どういうこと?
この人君の
パパか何か?
麻薬売った金で
同棲してるの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76%;top: 29.5%;width: 121px;height: 102px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 79%;top: 39.5%;width: 72px;height: 38px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 0%;

text:
あの、カズ…
大丈夫？
ここ来てから
一言も喋って
ないけど
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 37%;top: 64%;width: 114px;height: 112px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
こんなこと
止めるんだ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 84.5%;top: 74.5%;width: 103px;height: 85px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 89%;top: 87.5%;width: 53px;height: 39px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
